response.original_title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
response.overview: The fastest man on four wheels, Ricky Bobby is one of the greatest drivers in NASCAR history. A big, hairy American winning machine, Ricky has everything a dimwitted daredevil could want, a luxurious mansion, a smokin' hot wife and all the fast food he can eat. But Ricky's turbo-charged lifestyle hits an unexpected speed bump when he's bested by flamboyant Euro-idiot Jean Girard and reduced to a fear-ridden wreck.
response.tagline: The story of a man who could only count to #1.
response.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

titles.title: As Corridas Loucas de Ricky Bobby
